document.full_text: the 7-foot-2 former star, who led the league in blocks nine times, was the no. 1 draft pick in 1998 and the tallest player in the w.n.b.a.
document.title: margo dydek, towering women's basketball center, dies at 37
lines_and_colors: the 7-foot-2 former star, who led the league in blocks nine times, was the no. 1 draft pick in 1998 and the tallest player in the w.n.b.a.
